attributes.action: pressure Steve Mclaren into resigning his position as manager of the National football team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He is not fit to manage the Egland football team and the nation would like to see him replaced. 

If the petition is created then it will give the commom man the chance to voice his concerns, and for the Government and FA to listen to the view of a nation.
